title: Core Banking Platform Modernization
description: Unified dual legacy core banking plugins into a single .NET application, reducing system crashes by 40% and saving 20+ hours per month in maintenance.

title: Biometric Attendance Tracking
description: Architected a ZKTeco-based biometric attendance system that accelerated payroll cycles by 7 days and improved check-in accuracy across departments.

title: Real-Time Notification Bot
description: Developed a Telegram Bot API for monitoring core banking operations, improving response times and increasing system reliability to 99%.

title: Optimized Financial Reporting System
description: Refined SQL queries, indexing, and caching in reporting pipelines, cutting report generation from 30 minutes to under 2 seconds.

title: Odoo ERP Integration & Enhancements
description: Upgraded Odoo to version 14, integrated Microsoft Teams, and connected ABA PayWay, supporting 1,000+ monthly transactions and improving workflow efficiency.

title: KhmerCare Fundraising Platform
description: Built a Next.js real-time fundraising platform powering 198+ campaigns and raising $70.8K. Awarded Best Project & Team Effort at Pathmazing Inc.

title: Firearms Metrics Platform (SFMP)
description: Enhanced data processing in a React.js portal used by law enforcement, reducing reporting time from 30 minutes to under 5 and enabling faster data-driven decisions.

title: Retail POS System with Device Integration
description: Developed a POS system with automated inventory and scale integration, eliminating 99% of manual entry errors and streamlining retail operations.

title: Hotel Booking & Management System
description: Engineered a full-scale hotel management system with real-time booking engine, reducing guest check-in time by 50% and increasing booking efficiency by 30%.

title: Clinic Appointment & Tracking System
description: Built a clinic management system with scheduling, notifications, and patient tracking, cutting wait times by 45% and improving staff utilization by 20%.
